name: Authentication Trait
description: Authentication traits defines attributes shared by authentication activity and alert events.

status_detail.description:
The status_detail attribute contains details about the success or failure of the authentication. For example, possible details for Windows logon or logoff events are:
  • Success
    • LOGOFF_USER_INITIATED
    • LOGOFF_OTHER
  • Failure
    • USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST
    • INVALID_CREDENTIALS
    • ACCOUNT_DISABLED
    • ACCOUNT_LOCKED_OUT
    • PASSWORD_EXPIRED

status_id.description: The cross-platform status of the session operation.
